title: T.G.British.Bake.Off-S06E17-Christmas.Masterclass--BBC-2015-360p
description:
The Great British Bake Off - Christmas Masterclass

Season 6 Episode 17 of 17
or
Season 6 Masterclasses Episode 6 of 6

After the drama and deliciousness of Bake Off, the much-missed Mary and Paul are back to bring a generous dollop of baking cheer to Christmas this year. Step by step, they take us through stunning recipes that all the family can make during the festive season.

Mary kicks off with a pavlova wreath and Paul makes a Chelsea bun Christmas tree. Mary makes a decadent trifle layered with fruit compote and Paul puts leftovers to irresistible use with his turkey and ham pie. Mary makes a truly beautiful rosace a l'orange and Paul closes the show with his magnificent towering pandoro.
_____________________________________

640x360 resolution - with subtitles - enjoy !!

Not sure why this is episode 6 of 6, after the regular season 6 there only were 4 masterclasses.
Maybe there'll be a Christmas or New Year's special ?
